participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Rebellious but hopeful, looking for a way to turn life around.
participant_1.background: my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow. i'm here for shoplifting. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, with a deep appreciation for the little joys in life.
participant_2.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.
